data.title: Hakon Hakonarson, MD, PhD
data.meta_description: Hakon Hakonarson, MD, PhD, is the Director of the Center for Applied Genomics at the The Joseph Stokes Jr. Research Institute of Children's Hospital of Philadelphia.
